name: Gaze At Maze
description: Gaze At Maze is a 2D top-down Maze game based on the story of a weird maze world which is full of weird looking creatures, powerful bots guarding the human embryos against intruders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 1 Ghz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB of Video Memory, Capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: Any Compatible Sound Card
